name: Jump, Froggy! Jump!
description:
Embark on a frog's odyssey in "Jump, Froggy! Jump!" a challenging 3D platformer! In this enchanting world, you'll step into the webbed feet of a courageous frog on his journey to rescue the Princess Frog.
Jump your to the top of the castle and save your Froggy Princess!

For casual gamers try Easy mode:
- Pause menu checkpoints
- Quick checkpoint reloading

For all you competitive gamers try the classic mode:
- No “cheating”
- Saves your best time

Also wear stylish hats by completing each game mode and finding the special hat hidden somewhere around the game world.
